alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 17 at 4:35PM MDT until further notice by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central South Dakota, including the following counties, Lawrence, Meade and Pennington. * WHEN...Until 1030 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry drainages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 435 PM MDT, The public reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Rapid City, Rapid Valley, Ellsworth Air Force Base, Box Elder, Black Hawk, Summerset, New Underwood, Johnson Siding, Nemo, Piedmont, Hisega, Owanka, Caputa, Farmingdale, Wicksville, Tilford, Rapid City Airport, Viewfield, Thompson Butte and Curlew Lake. This includes the creek basins of ELk Creek, Box Elder Creek, and Rapid Creek.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
